memoPath.desc: Absolute path to the memo command
titlePrefix.desc: When executing `Memo: Today's Quick Memo`, it automatically inserts the specified prefix string of the title
dateFormat.desc: Follow format of date-fns. See: https://date-fns.org/v2.16.1/docs/format
insertISOWeek.desc: When executing `Memo: Today's Quick Memo`, it automatically inserts ISO Week number in the title
insertEmoji.desc: When executing `Memo: Today's Quick Memo`, it automatically inserts random-emoji in the title
gutterIconPath.desc: When executing `Memo: Grep`, the PATH to the icon displayed in the gutter
gutterIconSize.desc: When executing `Memo: Grep`, the size of icon displayed in gutter (default: 100%)
displayFileBirthTime.desc: Display birthtime of file in `Memo: Edit` additionally
withRespectMode.desc: Change appearance of search results. © 2011 Microsoft Corporation All Rights Reserved.」
grepLineBackgroundColor.desc: Background color of search result keywords
grepKeywordBackgroundColor.desc: Background color of line containing search result keywords
listMarkdownPreview.desc: Markdown Preview is displayed at the same time when selecting a file. However, `Markdown Preview Enhanced`(https://marketplace.visualstudio.com/items?itemName=shd101wyy.markdown-preview-enhanced) Extension must be installed.
openMarkdownPreview.desc: Open built-in Markdown Preview at the same time as opening the file in the editor. If `Markdown Preview Enhanced` Extension (https://marketplace.visualstudio.com/items?itemName=shd101wyy.markdown-preview-enhanced) is installed and `openMarkdownPreviewUseMPE` is set to `true`, use it.
listSortOrder.desc: Controls the order of Memo: List display. Selectable from `filename` or `birthtime` or `mtime`
memoGrepUseRipGrepConfigFile.desc: Do you want ripgrep to work with the configuration file (.ripgreprc)
memoGrepUseRipGrepConfigFilePath.desc: If you set `memoGrepUseRipGrepConfigFile` to `ture` and want to use ripgrep config file located further in a specific place, set the path of config file
memoTodoUserePattern.desc: Define a pattern to recognize as todo (default: ^.*@todo.*?:)
memoNewFilenameFromClipboard.desc: Use a copy of the OS clipboard as the name of the newly created file.
memoNewFilenameFromSelection.desc: Use the selected string in the active editor as the name of the newly created file
memoNewFilNameDateSuffix.desc: Add a date-related suffix after the file name (yyyy-MM-dd). The added string is passed to datefns.format (). See https://date-fns.org/v2.16.1/docs/format for more information.
openMarkdownPreviewUseMPE.desc: If `memo-life-for-you.openMarkdownPreview` is set to `true`, use `Markdown Preview Enhanced` (https://marketplace.visualstudio.com/items?itemName=shd101wyy.markdown-preview-enhanced) to open preview (default: false)
openChromeCustomizeURL.desc: Customize Chrome's URL to be launched with Memo: Open Chrome with <html contenteditable> command.
openTyporaExecPath.desc: The extension of the file to be displayed in the Memo:List/Edit.
memolistDisplayExtname.desc: The extension of the file to be displayed in the Memo:List/Edit.
